title: Ascension FPS issues
body:
I normally get 70-120 FPS on all game modes, running on a Macbook Pro. 

In the past, I have been able to play Ascension fine, but currently I get under 20FPS on that gamemode alone. All other gamemodes are fine. 

How do I fix this?

replies.body:
this has been an ongoing problem with mac users for a while now. every rotating game mode on mac suffers from an fps issue. the rotating modes used to run just fine before but slowly, one by one, each rotating game mode suffered an fps drop. i'm willing to bet that mac users will have an fps problem with the upcoming urf mode. 

the answers you'll be getting from riot is to check the fps issues guide (mac). i haven't tried it myself because every mac user is having the same problem. those that have gone through the guide have said it doesn't fix a thing. I've read someone had a new MacBook (all decked out) and still has fps problems with rotating game modes.

solution (100% not recommended): buy a pc Just to play this game. put your time and money elsewhere.

If that's the ONLY game mode where you get those fps drops, it almost makes me wonder if some of those game files for Ascension aren't working properly. Try running a quick repair through the client options. If that doesn't help let's go ahead and move onto troubleshooting your [**FPS**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#section-mac).

I actually found a quick fix that works, though not ideal - after TPing onto a platform, if I disconnect and reconnect my FPS goes back to normal. 

I'm also running a repair at the moment, but after searching the boards and based on DAXL's comment, it appears this is an ongoing issue with mac users which will not be solved by any normal methods. Do y'all at Riot have any plans to fix it?
